post.body:
Dear all,
I am a beginner with zeronet.
I want to use Zeronet for my personal project in which i want to send messages realt time after every half of second. Can you please tell me if this is possible with ZeroNet?

Hi  everyone,
I am using PeerMessage plugin to send and receive messages almost real time, like every half of second.
I want to know if it is possible to synchronize the database on realtime? like signing and publishing every half of second?
